nodes.text: The GSS-5C Dustmaker was a starfighter produced by SoroSuub Corporation for the reconstituted Sith Empire. A successor of the G-2A gunship, which was known for razing whole cities on the planet Sullust, the Dustmaker was made to surpass its predecessor's firepower. While its defenses are a bit below the standard base line for gunships and was only able to equip a single rail gun, these weaknesses were curtailed with the ability to carry proton torpedoes and a heavier laser cannon.
